   16: 
   17: -module(oauth_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   24: 
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Suite configuration
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [
   32:      {group, token_login},
   33:      {group, token_revocation},
   34:      {group, provision_token},
   35:      {group, commands},
   36:      {group, cleanup}
   37:     ].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [
   41:      {token_login, [sequence], token_login_tests()},
   42:      {token_revocation, [sequence], token_revocation_tests()},
   43:      {provision_token, [], [provision_token_login]},
   44:      {commands, [], [revoke_token_cmd_when_no_token,
   45:                      revoke_token_cmd]},
   46:      {cleanup, [], [token_removed_on_user_removal]}
   47:     ].
   48: 
   49: token_login_tests() ->
   50:     [
   51:      request_tokens_test,
   52:      login_access_token_test,
   53:      login_refresh_token_test,
   54:      login_with_other_users_token,
   55:      login_with_malformed_token
   56:     ].
   57: 
   58: token_revocation_tests() ->
   59:     [
   60:      login_with_revoked_token_test,
   61:      token_revocation_test
   62:     ].
   63: 
   64: suite() ->
   65:     escalus:suite().
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Init & teardown
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: 
   71: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   72:     case is_pgsql_available(Config0) of
   73:         true ->
   74:             Config = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_last, Config0),
   75:             escalus:init_per_suite(Config);
   76:         false ->
   77:             {skip, "PostgreSQL not available - check env configuration"}
   78:     end.
   79: 
   80: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   81:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config),
   82:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   85:     Config = case GroupName of
   86:                  commands -> ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0);
   87:                  _ -> Config0
   88:              end,
   89:     case get_auth_method() of
   90:         external ->
   91:             {skip, "external authentication requires plain password"};
   92:         _ ->
   93:             config_password_format(GroupName),
   94:             Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([bob, alice])),
   95:             assert_password_format(GroupName, Config2)
   96:     end.
   97: 
   98: end_per_group(cleanup, Config) ->
   99:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
  100: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  101:     set_store_password(plain),
  102:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([bob, alice])).
  103: 
  104: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0) ->
  105:     clean_token_db(),
  106:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0).
  107: 
  108: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  109:     clean_token_db(),
  110:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  111: 
  112: %%
  113: %% Tests
  114: %%
  115: 
  116: request_tokens_test(Config) ->
  117:     request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob).
  118: 
  119: login_with_revoked_token_test(Config) ->
  120:     %% given
  121:     RevokedToken = get_revoked_token(Config, bob),
  122:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, RevokedToken).
  123: 
  124: token_login_failure(Config, User, Token) ->
  125:     %% when
  126:     Result = login_with_token(Config, User, Token),
  127:     % then
  128:     {{auth_failed, _}, _, _} = Result.
  129: 
  130: get_revoked_token(Config, UserName) ->
  131:     BJID = escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserName),
  132:     JID = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(jid, from_binary, [BJID]),
  133:     Token = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token, [refresh, JID]),
  134:     ValidSeqNo = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token_odbc, get_valid_sequence_number,
  135:                                       [JID]),
  136:     RevokedToken0 = record_set(Token, [{5, invalid_sequence_no(ValidSeqNo)},
  137:                                        {7, undefined},
  138:                                        {8, undefined}]),
  139:     RevokedToken = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token_with_mac, [RevokedToken0]),
  140:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, serialize, [RevokedToken]).
  141: 
  142: invalid_sequence_no(SeqNo) ->
  143:     SeqNo - 1.
  144: 
  145: request_tokens_once_logged_in(Config) ->
  146:     request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob).
  147: 
  148: request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, User) ->
  149:     Self = self(),
  150:     Ref = make_ref(),
  151:     escalus:story(Config, [{User, 1}], fun(Client) ->
  152:                                                ClientShortJid = escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Client),
  153:                                                R = escalus_stanza:query_el(?NS_ESL_TOKEN_AUTH, []),
  154:                                                IQ = escalus_stanza:iq(ClientShortJid, <<"get">>, R),
  155:                                                escalus:send(Client, IQ),
  156:                                                Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  157:                                                {AT, RT} = extract_tokens(Result),
  158:                                                Self ! {tokens, Ref, {AT,RT}}
  159:                                        end),
  160:     receive
  161:         {tokens, Ref, Tokens} ->
  162:             Tokens
  163:     after
  164:         1000 -> error
  165:     end.
  166: 
  167: login_access_token_test(Config) ->
  168:     Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  169:     login_access_token_impl(Config, Tokens).
  170: 
  171: login_refresh_token_test(Config) ->
  172:     Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  173:     login_refresh_token_impl(Config, Tokens).
  174: 
  175: %% Scenario describing JID spoofing with an eavesdropped / stolen token.
  176: login_with_other_users_token(Config) ->
  177:     %% given user and another user's token
  178:     {_, BobsToken} = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  179:     AliceSpec = user_authenticating_with_token(Config, alice, BobsToken),
  180:     %% when we try to log in
  181:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  182:                  stream_features,
  183:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  184:                  authenticate,
  185:                  fun (Alice, Props, Features) ->
  186:                          escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:bind(<<"test-resource">>)),
  187:                          BindReply = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, bind_reply),
  188:                          {Alice, [{bind_reply, BindReply} | Props], Features}
  189:                  end],
  190:     {ok, _, Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  191:     %% then the server recognizes us as the other user
  192:     LoggedInAs = extract_bound_jid(proplists:get_value(bind_reply, Props)),
  193:     true = escalus_utils:get_username(LoggedInAs) /= escalus_users:get_username(Config, AliceSpec).
  194: 
  195: login_with_malformed_token(Config) ->
  196:     %% given
  197:     MalformedToken = <<"malformed ", (crypto:rand_bytes(64))/bytes>>,
  198:     %% when / then
  199:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, MalformedToken).
  200: 
  201: login_refresh_token_impl(Config, {_AccessToken, RefreshToken}) ->
  202:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, bob),
  203: 
  204:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  205:                  stream_features,
  206:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  207:                  maybe_use_compression
  208:                 ],
  209: 
  210:     {ok, ClientConnection, Props, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec, ConnSteps),
  211:     Props2 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, Props, {oauth_token, RefreshToken}),
  212:     AuthResultToken = (catch escalus_auth:auth_sasl_oauth(ClientConnection, Props2)),
  213:     ok.
  214: 
  215: %% users logs in using access token he obtained in previous session (stream has been
  216: %% already reset)
  217: login_access_token_impl(Config, {AccessToken, _RefreshToken}) ->
  218:     {{ok, _ }, ClientConnection, Props2} = login_with_token(Config, bob, AccessToken),
  219:     escalus_connection:reset_parser(ClientConnection),
  220:     {Props3, []} = escalus_session:start_stream(ClientConnection, Props2),
  221:     NewFeatures = escalus_session:stream_features(ClientConnection, Props3, []),
  222:     %todo: create step out of above lines
  223:     {NewClientConnection, Props4, NewFeatures2} =
  224:         escalus_session:bind(ClientConnection, Props3, NewFeatures),
  225:     {NewClientConnection2, _Props5, _NewFeatures3} =
  226:         escalus_session:session(NewClientConnection, Props4, NewFeatures2),
  227:     escalus:send(NewClientConnection2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  228:     escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(NewClientConnection2)).
  229: 
  230: login_with_token(Config, User, Token) ->
  231:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  232:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  233:                  stream_features,
  234:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  235:                  maybe_use_compression],
  236:     {ok, ClientConnection, Props, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnSteps),
  237:     Props2 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, Props, {oauth_token, Token}),
  238:     AuthResult = (catch escalus_auth:auth_sasl_oauth(ClientConnection, Props2)),
  239:     {AuthResult, ClientConnection, Props2}.
  240: 
  241: token_revocation_test(Config) ->
  242:     %% given
  243:     {Owner, _SeqNoToRevoke, Token} = get_owner_seqno_to_revoke(Config, bob),
  244:     %% when
  245:     ok = revoke_token(Owner),
  246:     %% then
  247:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, Token).
  248: 
  249: get_owner_seqno_to_revoke(Config, User) ->
  250:     {_, RefreshToken} = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, User),
  251:     [_, BOwner, _, SeqNo, _] = binary:split(RefreshToken, <<0>>, [global]),
  252:     Owner = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(jid, from_binary, [BOwner]),
  253:     {Owner, binary_to_integer(SeqNo), RefreshToken}.
  254: 
  255: revoke_token(Owner) ->
  256:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, revoke, [Owner]).
  257: 
  258: revoke_token_cmd_when_no_token(Config) ->
  259:     %% given existing user with no token
  260:     %% when revoking token
  261:     R = mimctl(Config, ["revoke_token", escalus_users:get_jid(Config, bob)]),
  262:     %% then no token was found
  263:     "User or token not found.\n" = R.
  264: 
  265: revoke_token_cmd(Config) ->
  266:     %% given existing user and token present in the database
  267:     _Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  268:     %% when
  269:     R = mimctl(Config, ["revoke_token", escalus_users:get_jid(Config, bob)]),
  270:     %% then
  271:     "Revoked.\n" = R.
  272: 
  273: token_removed_on_user_removal(Config) ->
  274:     %% given existing user with token and XMPP (de)registration available
  275:     _Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  276:     true = is_xmpp_registration_available(escalus_users:get_server(Config, bob)),
  277:     %% when user account is deleted
  278:     S = fun (Bob) ->
  279:                 IQ = escalus_stanza:remove_account(),
  280:                 escalus:send(Bob, IQ),
  281:                 timer:sleep(500),
  282:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [IQ], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  283:         end,
  284:     escalus:story(Config, [{bob, 1}], S),
  285:     %% then token database doesn't contain user's tokens
  286:     {selected, _, []} = get_users_token(Config, bob).
  287: 
  288: provision_token_login(Config) ->
  289:     %% given
  290:     VCard = make_vcard(Config, bob),
  291:     ProvisionToken = make_provision_token(Config, bob, VCard),
  292:     UserSpec = user_authenticating_with_token(Config, bob, ProvisionToken),
  293:     %% when logging in with provision token
  294:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec),
  295:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  296:     %% then user's vcard is placed into the database on login
  297:     Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Conn),
  298:     VCard = exml_query:subelement(Result, <<"vCard">>).
  299: 
  300: %%
  301: %% Helpers
  302: %%
  303: 
  304: extract_tokens(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = [#xmlel{name = <<"items">>} = Items ]}) ->
  305:     ATD = exml_query:path(Items, [{element, <<"access_token">>}, cdata]),
  306:     RTD = exml_query:path(Items, [{element, <<"refresh_token">>}, cdata]),
  307:     {base64:decode(ATD), base64:decode(RTD)}.
  308: 
  309: get_auth_method()        ->
  310:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  311:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  312:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, store_type,
  313:                          [XMPPDomain]).
  314: 
  315: set_store_password(Type) ->
  316:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  317:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  318:     AuthOpts = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  319:                                     [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}]),
  320:     NewAuthOpts = lists:keystore(password_format, 1, AuthOpts, {password_format, Type}),
  321:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_local_option,
  322:                          [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}, NewAuthOpts]).
  323: 
  324: config_password_format(login_scram) ->
  325:     set_store_password(scram);
  326: config_password_format(_) ->
  327:     set_store_password(plain).
  328: 
  329: assert_password_format(GroupName, Config) ->
  330:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config),
  331:     [verify_format(GroupName, User) || User <- Users],
  332:     Config.
  333: 
  334: verify_format(GroupName, {_User, Props}) ->
  335:     Username = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(proplists:get_value(username, Props)),
  336:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, Props),
  337:     Password = proplists:get_value(password, Props),
  338:     SPassword = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, get_password, [Username, Server]),
  339:     do_verify_format(GroupName, Password, SPassword).
  340: 
  341: do_verify_format(login_scram, _Password, SPassword) ->
  342:     %% returned password is a tuple containing scram data
  343:     {_, _, _, _} = SPassword;
  344: do_verify_format(_, Password, SPassword) ->
  345:     Password = SPassword.
  346: 
  347: %% @doc Set Fields of the Record to Values,
  348: %% when {Field, Value} <- FieldValues (in list comprehension syntax).
  349: record_set(Record, FieldValues) ->
  350:     F = fun({Field, Value}, Rec) ->
  351:                 setelement(Field, Rec, Value)
  352:         end,
  353:     lists:foldl(F, Record, FieldValues).
  354: 
  355: mimctl(Config, CmdAndArgs) ->
  356:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  357:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl_with_args(Node, convert_args(CmdAndArgs), Config).
  358: 
  359: convert_args(Args) -> [ convert_arg(A) || A <- Args ].
  360: 
  361: convert_arg(B) when is_binary(B) -> binary_to_list(B);
  362: convert_arg(A) when is_atom(A) -> atom_to_list(A);
  363: convert_arg(S) when is_list(S) -> S.
  364: 
  365: clean_token_db() ->
  366:     Q = [<<"DELETE FROM auth_token">>],
  367:     ODBCHost = <<"localhost">>, %% mam is also tested against local odbc
  368:     {updated, _} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_query, [ODBCHost, Q]).
  369: 
  370: get_users_token(C, User) ->
  371:     Q = ["SELECT * FROM auth_token at "
  372:          "WHERE at.owner = '", to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(C, User)), "';"],
  373:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_query,
  374:                          [escalus_users:get_server(C, User), Q]).
  375: 
  376: is_xmpp_registration_available(Domain) ->
  377:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Domain, mod_register]).
  378: 
  379: user_authenticating_with_token(Config, UserName, Token) ->
  380:     Spec1 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
  381:                            {oauth_token, Token}),
  382:     lists:keystore(auth, 1, Spec1, {auth, {escalus_auth, auth_sasl_oauth}}).
  383: 
  384: extract_bound_jid(BindReply) ->
  385:     exml_query:path(BindReply, [{element, <<"bind">>}, {element, <<"jid">>},
  386:                                 cdata]).
  387: 
  388: get_provision_key(Domain) ->
  389:     RPCArgs = [get_key, Domain, [], [{provision_pre_shared, Domain}]],
  390:     [{_, RawKey}] = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_hooks, run_fold, RPCArgs),
  391:     RawKey.
  392: 
  393: make_vcard(Config, User) ->
  394:     T = <<"<vCard xmlns='vcard-temp'>"
  395:           "  <FN>Full Name</FN>"
  396:           "  <NICKNAME>{{nick}}</NICKNAME>"
  397:           "</vCard>">>,
  398:     escalus_stanza:from_template(T, [{nick, escalus_users:get_username(Config, User)}]).
  399: 
  400: make_provision_token(Config, User, VCard) ->
  401:     ExpiryFarInTheFuture = {{2055,10,27},{10,54,22}},
  402:     Username = escalus_users:get_username(Config, User),
  403:     Domain = escalus_users:get_server(Config, User),
  404:     ServerSideJID = {jid, Username, Domain, <<>>,
  405:                      Username, Domain, <<>>},
  406:     T0 = {token, provision,
  407:           ExpiryFarInTheFuture,
  408:           ServerSideJID,
  409:           %% sequence no
  410:           undefined,
  411:           VCard,
  412:           %% MAC
  413:           undefined,
  414:           %% body
  415:           undefined},
  416:     T = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token_with_mac, [T0]),
  417:     %% assert no RPC error occured
  418:     {token, provision} = {element(1, T), element(2, T)},
  419:     serialize(T).
  420: 
  421: serialize(ServerSideToken) ->
  422:     Serialized = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, serialize, [ServerSideToken]),
  423:     if
  424:         is_binary(Serialized) -> Serialized;
  425:         not is_binary(Serialized) -> error(Serialized)
  426:     end.
  427: 
  428: to_lower(B) when is_binary(B) ->
  429:     list_to_binary(string:to_lower(binary_to_list(B))).
  430: 
  431: is_pgsql_available(_) ->
  432:     Q = [<<"SELECT version();">>],
  433:     %% TODO: hardcoded ODBCHost
  434:     ODBCHost = <<"localhost">>,
  435:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_query, [ODBCHost, Q]) of
  436:         {selected, [<<"version">>], [{<<"PostgreSQL", _/binary>>}]} ->
  437:             true;
  438:         _ ->
  439:             false
  440:     end.
